title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: There is a strange behavior when copying a package in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui. When selecting xxx as the destination and performing the copy package action, the package 'ui' is unexpectedly included in the resulting xx package.
OB: The package 'ui' is included in the resulting xx package after copying.
EB: The package 'ui' should not be included in the resulting xx package after copying.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui package in jdt.ui.
2. Select the xxx package as the destination for copying.
3. Perform the copy package action.
4. Observe the resulting xx package and confirm if the 'ui' package is included.
